page.title: 12CHANGES (CONTINUED)
page.content: Many of the fields have been added together and are bigger too. The{loch of Skene}in 1931 was being used as a reservoir to drive an electric turbine to supply electricity to Dunecht house and to other estate houses.This use ceased in 1964.Islands have been built on the loch for shooting purposes.The loch is extensively used for{recreation}by the Aberdeen,Stonehaven yacht club and is a S.S.S.I. because of the vegetation surrounding it and large numbers of wild fowl coming to the loch in winter. In 1931 many of the{Estate woodlands } were quite old and large areas blew down in the great gale of 1953.all these areas have been replanted together with other areas not suitable for farming and shooting.
